channel.title: Weird 'gravity' glitch.
channel.description:
After I shot down the osprey, right before you have to fight the tank with the manual reload rocket launcher. All objects acted weird and floaty.
I don't know if it's because of the osprey or something else triggered it, but it caused everything to clip (couldn't hit tank with rockets).
After a restart it was gone and I haven't been able to reproduce it.
I frapsed it. [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p4CgwI9GeJw&hd=1[/url]
+ a little thing. The glock isn't fully textured because you don't see some parts when holding/shooting/reloading the gun. But what happen when the idle animation kicks in. [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/541812752913112726/B2C77385AB6CCD72A4F775D965E83757888DCD58/[/img]
+ I got vertical stripes on some guns on some occasions. These go away when the lighting changes. (see screen shot above)

item.title: Weird 'gravity' glitch.
item.dc:creator: u4ea
item.description:
After I shot down the osprey, right before you have to fight the tank with the manual reload rocket launcher. All objects acted weird and floaty.

I don’t know if it’s because of the osprey or something else triggered it, but it caused everything to clip (couldn’t hit tank with rockets).

After a restart it was gone and I haven’t been able to reproduce it.

I frapsed it.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p4CgwI9GeJw&hd=1

  • a little thing. The glock isn’t fully textured because you don’t see some parts when holding/shooting/reloading the gun.
    But what happen when the idle animation kicks in.

  • I got vertical stripes on some guns on some occasions. These go away when the lighting changes. (see screen shot above)

Read full topic
